title: The Bachelorette: Timm Hanly unrecognisable in teenage pictures
text:
The Bachelorette's Timm Hanly is known for his unruly long hair, tattoos and penchant for eyeliner.

But before finding his signature style, the 27-year-old was just another awkward teenager growing up in Port Douglas, Queensland.

In never-before-seen family photos, Timm looks completely unrecognisable as an adolescent back in 2013.

The Bachelorette's Timm Hanly looks unrecognisable in throwback snaps from his teenage years, before growing his hair and getting tattoos. Pictured left: in 2013, and right: in 2019

Timm's mother, Sue, shared a photo to Facebook six years ago of her son at a family gathering, where he looked very different than he does today.

He was dressed in a pink Ralph Lauren shirt, was clean shaven and had short hair.

In the throwback picture, Timm also has a much slimmer frame and is lacking the muscle definition he has these days.

Who's that guy? This photo, which was shared by Timm's brother in 2012, shows the reality TV star looking completely different while posing at the beach

All grown up! These days, Timm is known for his long hair, occasional eyeliner and body art

Another throwback photo, which was shared by Timm's brother in 2012, also shows the reality TV star looking completely different while posing at the beach.

These days, Timm is known for his long hair, occasional eyeliner and body art.

He has become a fan favourite on The Bachelorette thanks to his quirky sense of humour, apparent lack of inhibitions and genuine chemistry with Angie Kent.

Gym fanatic! Timm has also bulked up in recent years by hitting the gym

Will he win? Timm has become a fan favourite on The Bachelorette thanks to his quirky sense of humour, apparent lack of inhibitions and genuine chemistry with Angie Kent (right)

During a recent episode, he had his first single date with Angie, before ruining the moment by deciding to relieve himself mid-conversation.

Timm was discussing how he would care for Angie if she became disabled before he blurted out: 'Man, I really need to pee, aye!'

As he walked off to urinate in the bushes, he told producers: 'I'm going to p**s, aye, I'm going to p**s my pants.'

Angie burst into laughter, finding Timm's honesty endearing.
description: The Bachelorette's Timm Hanly is known for his unruly long hair, tattoos and penchant for eyeliner.
authors: Joshua Fox For Daily Mail Australia
